FuncDef:
The group-member command adds a specified interface to an observing port group.
The undo group-member command deletes a specified interface from an observing port group. The group-member command adds a specified interface to an observing port group. The undo group-member command deletes a specified interface from an observing port group. By default, no interface is added to an observing port group.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the type of ports to be added to an observing port group.
-

Specifies the number of ports to be added to an observing port group.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies the name of a port to be added to an observing port group.
-

Specifies the number of ports to be added to an observing port group.
-

Specifies the name of a port to be added to an observing port group.
-

ExtraInfo: If users want to mirror packets to multiple observing ports, add these ports to an observing port group. The mirrored packets are then copied to all the member ports of the observing port group.
